resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

praveenbingo opened a new pull request #3137: ARROW-3970: [Gandiva][C++] Remove unnecessary boost dependencies.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3137
 
 
   Removed the dynamic dependencies since we do not need them.

wesm commented on issue #3137: ARROW-3970: [Gandiva][C++] Remove unnecessary boost dependencies.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3137#issuecomment-445559511
 
 
   I don't think running benchmarks in a test suite is a good idea at all. We've discussed this in other PRs and tests. Can this be moved out of the scope of `mvn test`?

praveenbingo commented on issue #3137: ARROW-3970: [Gandiva][C++] Remove unnecessary boost dependencies.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3137#issuecomment-445559751
 
 
   > I don't think running benchmarks in a test suite is a good idea at all. We've discussed this in other PRs and tests. Can this be moved out of the scope of `mvn test`?
   
   Agreed, I thought this was fixed too. 
   
   Looks like only the cpp benchmarks were moved out, created https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3973  to fix for java.
   
   Will pick that up next.

wesm closed pull request #3137: ARROW-3970: [Gandiva][C++] Remove unnecessary boost dependencies.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3137
 
 
   

This is a PR merged from a forked repository.
As GitHub hides the original diff on merge, it is displayed below for
the sake of provenance:

As this is a foreign pull request (from a fork), the diff is supplied
below (as it won't show otherwise due to GitHub magic):

diff --git a/cpp/src/gandiva/CMakeLists.txt b/cpp/src/gandiva/CMakeLists.txt
index b71313e019..9ee03a9912 100644
--- a/cpp/src/gandiva/CMakeLists.txt
+++ b/cpp/src/gandiva/CMakeLists.txt
@@ -63,9 +63,6 @@ set(SRC_FILES annotator.cc
 
 set(GANDIVA_SHARED_PRIVATE_LINK_LIBS
   arrow_shared
-  ${BOOST_REGEX_LIBRARY}
-  ${BOOST_SYSTEM_LIBRARY}
-  ${BOOST_FILESYSTEM_LIBRARY}
   LLVM::LLVM_INTERFACE
   ${RE2_LIBRARY})
 
diff --git a/java/gandiva/src/test/java/org/apache/arrow/gandiva/evaluator/MicroBenchmarkTest.java b/java/gandiva/src/test/java/org/apache/arrow/gandiva/evaluator/MicroBenchmarkTest.java
index cd297034df..c4d6bd9070 100644
--- a/java/gandiva/src/test/java/org/apache/arrow/gandiva/evaluator/MicroBenchmarkTest.java
+++ b/java/gandiva/src/test/java/org/apache/arrow/gandiva/evaluator/MicroBenchmarkTest.java
@@ -58,7 +58,7 @@ public void testAdd3() throws Exception {
         1 * MILLION, 16 * THOUSAND,
         4);
     System.out.println("Time taken for projecting 1m records of add3 is " + timeTaken + "ms");
-    Assert.assertTrue(timeTaken <= 10 * toleranceRatio);
+    Assert.assertTrue(timeTaken <= 13 * toleranceRatio);
   }
 
   @Test
diff --git a/java/memory/a.out b/java/memory/a.out
new file mode 100755
index 0000000000..0ff0159d78
Binary files /dev/null and b/java/memory/a.out differ
diff --git a/java/memory/org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper.cc b/java/memory/org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper.cc
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000..599a806933
--- /dev/null
+++ b/java/memory/org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper.cc
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+/*
+ * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
+ * contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
+ * this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+ * The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
+ * (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
+ * the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+ *
+ *    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+ *
+ * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+ * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+ * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+ * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+ * limitations under the License.
+ */
+
+#include "org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper.h"
+#include <string>
+#include <stdlib.h>
+
+static int i = 400;
+/*
+ * Class:     org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper
+ * Method:    randomNativeMethod
+ * Signature: ()V
+ */
+JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper_randomNativeMethod
+  (JNIEnv *env , jobject obj) {
+
+  i++;
+}
+
+
+/*
+ * Class:     org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper
+ * Method:    allocMemory
+ * Signature: ()I
+ */
+JNIEXPORT jlong JNICALL Java_org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper_allocMemory (JNIEnv *env , jobject obj) {
+
+  std::string *s = new std::string ("hello");
+  return (long)s;
+
+}
+
+/*
+ * Class:     org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper
+ * Method:    deleteMemory
+ * Signature: ()I
+ */
+JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper_deleteMemory(JNIEnv *env, jobject obj, jlong addr) {
+  free((void *)addr);
+}
+
diff --git a/java/memory/org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper.h b/java/memory/org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper.h
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000..716e500bd6
--- /dev/null
+++ b/java/memory/org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper.h
@@ -0,0 +1,37 @@
+/* DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - it is machine generated */
+#include <jni.h>
+/* Header for class org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper */
+
+#ifndef _Included_org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper
+#define _Included_org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper
+#ifdef __cplusplus
+extern "C" {
+#endif
+/*
+ * Class:     org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper
+ * Method:    randomNativeMethod
+ * Signature: ()V
+ */
+JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper_randomNativeMethod
+  (JNIEnv *, jobject);
+
+/*
+ * Class:     org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper
+ * Method:    allocMemory
+ * Signature: ()J
+ */
+JNIEXPORT jlong JNICALL Java_org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper_allocMemory
+  (JNIEnv *, jobject);
+
+/*
+ * Class:     org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper
+ * Method:    deleteMemory
+ * Signature: (J)V
+ */
+JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_apache_arrow_memory_TestJNIWrapper_deleteMemory
+  (JNIEnv *, jobject, jlong);
+
+#ifdef __cplusplus
+}
+#endif
+#endif

wesm commented on issue #3137: ARROW-3970: [Gandiva][C++] Remove unnecessary boost dependencies.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3137#issuecomment-445568542
 
 
   I just immediately rolled back this commit. This patch has a binary executable checked in `a.out`. Can you please remove that? Are the TestJNIWrapper changes needed for this patch?

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description: Remove unnecessary dynamic dependencies on Boost since we are anyway using the static versions.

comments.body: Can you comply with the {{ARROW_BOOST_USE_SHARED}} option?
I undid this patch seconds after merging when I noticed that a binary executable had been checked in
